description:
Business English will provide you with all the information you need to know to be able to be a more efficient and competent business writer. If you are an ESL or EFL student or even a native English speaker that needs a review on the mechanics of the English language; you will find this course useful.

You will learn the basics of the different parts of a sentence, as well as more in depth information on how to write that will improve your writing skills in any business situation.

The course is separated in for sections and each section includes a series of different lectures, interactive grammar exercises, and downloadable pdf. lecture notes, which will help you speak and write more professionally.

This course covers:

  • Sentence structure
  • Sentences errors & how to correct them
  • Nouns
  • Pronouns
  • Verbs
  • Active & Passive Voice
  • Verbals
  • Verb Tenses
  • Subject Verb Agreement
  • Adjectives
  • Adverbs
  • Conjunctions & Interjections
  • Prepositions
title: Business English
